title: Why do some chiropractors oppose vaccines?
description: Answer (1 of 9): There is nothing in my chiropractic training that made me opposed to vaccination. In fact, in our public health and microbiology classes we were taught about vaccines and some of the benefits that they provided. It's not the training, but it may be the mindset that attracted them...
